thread.title: Mariah Carey leaves LAX with twins and beau Bryan Tanaka | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey leaves LAX with twins and beau Bryan Tanaka | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Mariah Carey leaves LAX with twins and beau Bryan Tanaka | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She opted for platform sandal wedges, tying her blonde locks up in a high ponytail and accessorizing with oversize sunglasses and large silver hoops. Her five-year-old twins, Moroccan and Monroe, looked adorable in matching grey-and red-colored outfits each holding their backpacks, while Bryan sported a handsome grin in a black tiger leather jacket and grey cargo pants. Smile wide: The 46-year-old pop star - dressed in a black leather jacket and matching color track pants - was accompanied by her boyfriend Bryan Tanaka Cat's out of the bag: The I Don't singer recently confirmed she is dating the 33-year-old backup dancer; he accompanied the family of three wearing a black leather jacket and grey cargo pants as he sported a wide smile She told AP she will still remain private, however: 'I just don't feel comfortable talking about my personal life...Me and my boyfriend don't want to do that' This appearance comes after the I Don't singer told AP about her relationship with Bryan. 'I'm just going to be like, "I really don't talk about my personal life,"' she said. 'Because that's what I used to do and it really worked for a minute, back, a while ago. 'I just don't feel comfortable talking about my personal life...Me and my boyfriend don't want to do that,' she added. The two have stirred speculation over the last few months as they have been spotted spending quality time together, including on Valentine's Day where the couple shared a steamy pic of them drinking champagne in a hot tub. High spirits: Mariah appeared to be looking forward to her travel destination, bringing along her five-year-old kids, Moroccan and Monroe Official: Mariah and Bryan have stirred much speculation after being spotted together on multiple occasions 'Dem kids:' The hitmaker also told AP she is touring with Lionel Richie in March and is excited to bring her two kids. She shared this post to her Instagram on Friday with the caption: 'Pon de studio with #demkids' Although Mariah decided to still remain private about Bryan, she did not hold back when talking about her five-year-old twins, Moroccan and Monroe. 'Roc and Roe do get to come,' she gushed when speaking about her upcoming tour with Lionel Richie in March. 'They love to go onstage and, actually, they are very musical already,' she added. 'They are happy when they get to go with me on tour and there's other kids there, too, so it's good.' Mariah told AP: 'They love to go onstage and, actually, they are very musical already' Steamy: The couple shared a romantic date night on Valentine's Day Nick Cannon on the other hand doesn't seem to buy Mariah and Bryan's sudden relationship - which appeared to bother her former Australian fiancé, James Packer. The father to Mariah's kids said in an interview with Howard Stern in February: 'First of all, I think the whole reality show is fake. I’m a producer, so you can’t have a well-lit private conversation. Like, that s— doesn’t happen,' he explained. 'I don’t buy none of that s—.' However, the 36-year-old rapper continues to support whatever made the singer happy. Not buying it? Nick Cannon - the ex of Mariah Carey and father to their twins - doesn't believe their relationship is credible, however; pictured here on Wednesday However: He continues to support whatever the singer wants Meanwhile, Mariah recently performed a redemption show live on Jimmy Kimmel, where she sang her 1990 hit Vision of Love and I Don't, a new collaboration with YG. She is all set to hit the road for the All The Hits tour with Richie, the first North American tour by Mariah in six years. The 35-show kicks off on March 15 in Baltimore, Maryland and will hit arenas including Chicago, Toronto, New York, Boston, Detroit, St. Louis, Denvis, Seattle, Los Angeles and Dallas until May 27. All set: Mariah's 35-show, All The Hits, kicks off in Baltimore, Maryland on March 15 Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
